queries.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gpu_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Flex GPU.0 Compute Util" or r["_field"] == "Flex GPU.0 Decode1/Encode1 Util" or r["_field"] == "Flex GPU.0 Decode2/Encode2 Util")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gpu_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Flex GPU.1 Compute Util" or r["_field"] == "Flex GPU.1 Decode1/Encode1 Util" or r["_field"] == "Flex GPU.1 Decode2/Encode2 Util")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

charts.name: Intel Xeon SP Total CPU Usage

queries.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

spec.name: Intel Xeon SP and Flex 140 GPU Telemetry
